Package edu.handong.csee.java.lab06

Class Cesco

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.handong.csee.java.lab06.Cesco

  • public class Cesco
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines a Cesco object. When you input the house volume value and the initial value of the bugs in the house, you can get the total number of the bugs, the total bug volume,and the number of weeks taken until the house is full of bugs. The growth rate of bugs is fixed at 0.95 and one bug volume is fixed at 0.002.
    Author:
    jo jeong hoon
